name: Robert G. GARZA, petitioner, v. TEXAS.

court.name: Supreme Court of the United States

parties:
Robert G. GARZA, petitioner,
v.
TEXAS.
attorneys: Application for stay of execution of sentence of death presented to Justice SCALIA and by him referred to the Court denied. Petition for writ of certiorari to the Court of Criminal Appeals of Texas denied.
casebody.head_matter:
Robert G. GARZA, petitioner,
v.
TEXAS.
No. 13-6445, 13A283.
Supreme Court of the United States
Sept. 19, 2013.
Case below, 213 S.W.3d 338.
Application for stay of execution of sentence of death presented to Justice SCALIA and by him referred to the Court denied. Petition for writ of certiorari to the Court of Criminal Appeals of Texas denied.
